entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
